name: part_007
file: tmp_【#大空スバル３周年】おまたせ！今日はたのしんでってな～！！！！：SUBARU 3rd anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [mhvHZpK-9Ss]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'you&me' by Oozora Subaru, Himemori Luna, Yuzuki Choco, and Shishiro Botan.
MC section after the song performance, including group photo session.

subtitles.original: どんな場面だって pinky pump
subtitles.english: No matter the scene, pinky pump

subtitles.original: ヒトツトヒトツ　ヒトリトヒトリ
subtitles.english: One and one, person and person

subtitles.original: 出会って　フタリになる you & me
subtitles.english: Meeting and becoming two, you & me

subtitles.original: ヒトリじゃないって　それだけで good morning
subtitles.english: Just not being alone makes it a good morning

subtitles.original: 始まりでしょ　ヨルガアサニ
subtitles.english: It's the beginning, night into morning

subtitles.original: キセツガハナニ
subtitles.english: Seasons into flowers

subtitles.original: 出会って　ミライになる you & me
subtitles.english: Meeting and becoming the future, you & me

subtitles.original: 愛よりもっと　ラフな笑顔で
subtitles.english: With a smile more casual than love

subtitles.original: 終わんない happy dance
subtitles.english: An unending happy dance

subtitles.original: It's for you and me, let's go!
subtitles.english: It's for you and me, let's go!

subtitles.original: Go Go Go Go! It's for you and me!
subtitles.english: Go Go Go Go! It's for you and me!

subtitles.original: Go Go Go Go! On the funky beat!
subtitles.english: Go Go Go Go! On the funky beat!

subtitles.original: ハヤサデラミノ
subtitles.english: With the speed of...

subtitles.original: It's for me, for you, and me
subtitles.english: It's for me, for you, and me

subtitles.original: だから Check it out! Check it out! Yo!
subtitles.english: So Check it out! Check it out! Yo!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、スバル、ルナ、チョコ先生、
subtitles.english: Alright! So, we've just seen Subaru, Luna, Choco-sensei,

subtitles.original: ぼたんちゃんのYou & Me見てもらいましたー！
subtitles.english: and Botan-chan perform "You & Me"!

subtitles.original: どうでしたか？ルナ、大丈夫？生きとるか？
subtitles.english: How was it? Luna, you okay? Are you still alive?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、大丈夫。
subtitles.english: I'm okay, I'm okay.

subtitles.original: 死んどるやないか。はい、ということで、力の限りを尽くしたこれ、
subtitles.english: You're clearly dead. Anyway, you gave it everything you had,

subtitles.original: ルナ。ちゃんとやってたもんね。
subtitles.english: Luna. You did a great job.

subtitles.original: 偉い！
subtitles.english: Good girl!

subtitles.original: ねえ、なんでぼたんちゃん、肩もんでたの途中で。
subtitles.english: Hey, Botan-chan, why were you massaging her shoulders halfway through?

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと2番も頑張ってもらおうと思って。
subtitles.english: Well, I wanted her to hang in there for the second verse too.

subtitles.original: あ、頑張って。頑張ってねって。チョコ先生のこれ勢い強すぎて
subtitles.english: Ah, like "Keep it up, keep it up." Choco-sensei, your momentum was so strong,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ怖かったんだけど、スバル。
subtitles.english: Subaru was actually pretty scared.

subtitles.original: いやだってね、掛け声はもう、やんなきゃなと思って。
subtitles.english: Well, I felt like I just had to do the shouts properly.

subtitles.original: やったけど気合いが。チョコ先生はもう全力でやってたよ。確かに。
subtitles.english: You did, but the spirit... Choco-sensei was definitely going all out.

subtitles.original: 一人だけ昇龍拳みたいになってた。すげえの、もう。
subtitles.english: She was like doing a Shoryuken all by herself. It was amazing.

subtitles.original: ねえ。ということで皆さんありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Right. Anyway, thank you very much, everyone!

subtitles.original: せっかくなので、写真でもね、撮りたいなーと思うんですけど。
subtitles.english: Since we're all here, I'd like to take some photos.

subtitles.original: おー！いいのー、写真撮りたい、撮りたい。
subtitles.english: Oh! That sounds good, I want to take photos, I want to take photos.

subtitles.original: じゃあルナのとこ集合！
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone gather around Luna!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっとね、メガネを... 家族写真か！
subtitles.english: Now, let's put on the glasses... It looks like a family photo!

subtitles.original: じゃあ撮るよー。このね、メガネもね、わためからサングラス借りました。
subtitles.english: Okay, taking the picture. These glasses, I borrowed the sunglasses from Watame.

subtitles.original: イエーイ、ありがとうございます。パリピサングラス。はい、チーズ！
subtitles.english: Yay, thank you. Party-people sunglasses. Say cheese!

subtitles.original: ルナ、どこ見てんの？
subtitles.english: Luna, where are you looking?

subtitles.original: みんなどこ見てんの？
subtitles.english: Where is everyone looking?

subtitles.original: 確かに。このカメラを見なきゃいけない。このカメラ。こっちな。そうだよ。
subtitles.english: True. We have to look at this camera. This one. This way. That's right.

subtitles.original: はい、チーズ！
subtitles.english: Say cheese!

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございまーす。
subtitles.english: Alright, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: え、あとさ、ちょっとさ、チョコ先生とぼたんちゃんが、あの、足長いから、
subtitles.english: Oh, and also, Choco-sensei and Botan-chan have such long legs,

subtitles.original: うん、こっち来て。
subtitles.english: so come over here.

subtitles.original: 何？何？スバルじゃできないことしてあげるわよ。
subtitles.english: What? What is it? We'll do something Subaru can't do.

subtitles.original: なんやそれ！足、ルナと変わんないから、スバル。
subtitles.english: What's that supposed to mean! My legs aren't that different from Luna's.

subtitles.original: ルナのが長いだろ、お前ら。じゃあ足出して、こうやって、前に。
subtitles.english: Wait, Luna's are longer? You guys... Okay, stick your legs out like this, in front.

subtitles.original: 足長いけど。
subtitles.english: Our legs are long, but...

subtitles.original: 足なげー、二人！チョコ先生とぼたんちゃん！
subtitles.english: Your legs are so long, you two! Choco-sensei and Botan-chan!

subtitles.original: 腰の位置高すぎだろ！ちょっとこれ、やばいよ、ルナ。やばい。
subtitles.english: Your waists are so high! This is crazy, Luna. Crazy.

subtitles.original: なんかスバルたちやばい。
subtitles.english: Subaru and Luna look kinda bad next to them.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあさ、二人ともさ、ここでさ、うん、こうやってさ、
subtitles.english: Well, how about you two stand here, and like,

subtitles.original: スバルたちよくゾンビしてるから、戦隊モノっぽいの撮りたくて、ここで、こうやって二人で。
subtitles.english: Subaru and Luna often play the zombies, so I want to take a Super Sentai-style photo with you two doing this.

subtitles.original: おー、OK。
subtitles.english: Oh, OK.

subtitles.original: スッ... おおー！新着。で、ルナとスバルで、ここで、背中合わせで仁王立ち。
subtitles.english: Woah! That's new. And Luna and Subaru will stand back-to-back here.

subtitles.original: チョコ先生セクシーだな。やばい、マジでやばい。
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei is so sexy. This is crazy, seriously crazy.

subtitles.original: カメラ上、上にお願いします、カメラ。あ、これ、これですよ。
subtitles.english: Camera up, please tilt the camera up. Ah, this is the one.

subtitles.original: あ、隠れてる？こう？上から目線だったら大丈夫。
subtitles.english: Oh, am I hidden? Like this? It's fine if it's from a high angle.

subtitles.original: あ、見下ろし視線。あ、いいじゃん、いいじゃん。
subtitles.english: Ah, a looking-down perspective. Oh, this is good, this is good.

subtitles.original: なんか椅子がある。椅子があるけど。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: There's a chair there. A chair is in the way, but... thank you.

subtitles.original: はい、これね。ちょっとサングラスも取りたいな。
subtitles.english: Right, this one. I also want to take some without the sunglasses.

subtitles.original: さ、取る？おいきたー！シュンシュン。
subtitles.english: Okay, taking them off? Here we go! Swish, swish.

subtitles.original: おい、いいじゃん。シャキーン。どうあがいても家族写真になっちゃうな。
subtitles.english: Oh, this is nice. Sparkle! No matter what we do, it ends up looking like a family photo.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、いいよ。なんでこんな家族っぽくなっちゃうんだろうねー。
subtitles.english: Alright then, that's good. I wonder why we look so much like a family.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、今日は本当に来てくれてありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, thank you all so much for coming today!

subtitles.original: あ、スバルもダンスの振り付けとかありがとう。
subtitles.english: Ah, and thank you too, Subaru, for the dance choreography and everything.

subtitles.original: あ、そうそう！ちょっとね、もう、どの、どれが一番いいかなーってね、
subtitles.english: Oh, right! I was thinking about which parts would be best,

subtitles.original: もう朝まで考えたんでね、みんなもう一回見直してくださいね、この後。
subtitles.english: and stayed up until morning thinking about it, so please watch it again later, everyone.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ最後に、なんかスバル3周年なのね。
subtitles.english: Alright, so finally, it's Subaru's 3rd anniversary.

subtitles.original: だから、3周年おめでとうって言って、バイバイしたい。
subtitles.english: So, I want to say "Happy 3rd Anniversary" and then say goodbye.

subtitles.original: しょうがねえなー。しょうがねえなー。
subtitles.english: I guess we have no choice. I guess we have no choice.

subtitles.original: なんやそれ！今なんか、あれ、スバル変なこと言った？
subtitles.english: What's with that reaction! Did I just say something weird?

subtitles.original: なんでこんなシーンとなっちゃうんだってなっちゃうんで。
subtitles.english: I was wondering why it suddenly went so quiet.

subtitles.original: じゃあ最後、みんなおめでとうって言ってくれる？
subtitles.english: So, for the end, will everyone say congratulations?

subtitles.original: いいともー！いいよー。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Sure thing! Okay! Thank you.
